attributes.action: scrap the nuclear arms programmes and begin worldwide nuclear disarming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The greatest threat to the destruction of our world is no longer the Russians, Americans or in fact any other individual nation. The fact is that Global Warming is our new nemisis. Only by working together and disarming can we ensure the safety of the world for our children to share in peace and progress. This time will be looked back upon, by our great grand children and theirs, and thought of as the turning point in humanities journey into the universe, only if we can overcome our leaders petty naive squabbles over money. Let us unite as humans and move forward as one. Rid ourselves of trident and save our world.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic already:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=trident
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
